title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
Introducing the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch. This stunning timepiece combines style and functionality, making it the perfect accessory for any man.

The watch features a sleek black sunburst dial with gold-tone and silver-tone accents, adding a touch of sophistication to your wrist. The luminescent hands and markers ensure easy readability, even in low-light conditions.

Crafted with a gold-tone stainless steel case and a black unidirectional timing bezel with gold-tone accents, this watch exudes elegance and durability. The domed mineral crystal provides added protection against scratches and daily wear.

With a water resistance of up to 100 meters, this watch is suitable for swimming and snorkeling, ensuring it can keep up with your active lifestyle.

The Bulova Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch is equipped with a 6-hand chronograph and calendar function, allowing you to track time with precision. The additional features include a 24-hour display and a convenient calendar display.

The bracelet of this watch is made from gold-tone stainless steel, designed with curved and faceted links for a comfortable and stylish fit. The sport foldover closure ensures a secure and adjustable fit for any wrist size.

Experience luxury and functionality with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch. Upgrade your timekeeping game with this exceptional timepiece.

The black sunburst dial is adorned with gold-tone and silver-tone accents, creating a striking contrast. The hands and markers are luminescent, allowing for easy readability in any lighting condition. 

Equipped with a 6-hand chronograph and calendar function, this watch offers both style and functionality. The chronograph feature allows you to accurately measure elapsed time, while the 24-hour display and calendar keep you organized and on schedule. 

With a water resistance of 100m, this timepiece can withstand splashes and brief submersion, making it suitable for everyday wear. 

The bracelet of the watch is made of gold-tone stainless steel and features curved and faceted links, adding a touch of sophistication. The sport foldover closure ensures a secure and comfortable fit. 

Elevate your style with the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch. Order now and experience the perfect blend of luxury and functionality.
